metadata.title: CVE-2019-8380 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-628. A NULL pointer dereferenceoccurs in AP4_Track::GetSampleIndexForTimeStampMs() located inCore/Ap4Track.cpp. It can triggered by sending a crafted file to themp4audioclip binary. It allows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service(Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
